snippet.title: Samba de Amigo | Announcement Trailer | Meta Quest 2 + 3 + Pro
snippet.description:
Pre-order Samba de Amigo on Meta Quest today: https://metaque.st/43yIffy

Amigo is back: get up and shake it in VR!
It's time for an all- new Samba de Amigo: a music rhythm game that allows you to party around the world!

Pick up your maracas and groove to over 40 hit songs from the world's most popular genres, with even more arriving as post-launch DLC!

Feeling confident in your skills?
Complete the StreamiGo! challenges to help Amigo rise to fame.
Strut that style by customizing your character with unique costumes and accessories.
Take the party to a global level: hit the floor in World Party mode.
Show the world what you've got by competing on the online leaderboards.

Pre-order the game today: https://metaque.st/43yIffy
Learn more: http://sambadeamigo.sega.com/ 

ⒸSEGA. All rights reserved. SEGA is registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office. SEGA, the SEGA logo, Samba de Amigo and Samba de Amigo are registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA CORPORATION. All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners.
